item.title: Baptism
item.description: We asked kids to tell us the story of Jesus being baptized in their own words.

item.title: Sacrament
item.description: We asked kids to tell us the story of the Last Supper in their own words and to explain why it matters for our lives today.

item.title: Who is Jesus?
item.description: We asked kids to tell us who Jesus is in their own words.

item.title: The Widow's Mite
item.description: We asked kids to tell us the story of the widow’s mite in their own words.

item.title: The Atonement
item.description: We asked kids to tell us about the Atonement of Jesus Christ in their own words.

item.title: The Birth of Jesus
item.description: We asked kids to tell us about the birth of Jesus in their own words.

item.title: The Good Samaritan
item.description: We asked kids to tell us the story of the Good Samaritan in their own words.

item.title: Jesus Heals a Man on the Sabbath
item.description: We asked kids to tell us the story of Jesus healing a man on the Sabbath in their own words.

item.title: Jesus Organizes the Church
item.description: We asked kids to tell us about the way Jesus organized the Church in their own words.

item.title: Fishers of Men
item.description: We asked kids to tell us the story of Jesus calling his Apostles to be “fishers of men” in their own words.
